attributes.action: Abandon the plans to build a new Royal yacht.
attributes.additional_details: With the number of people in the UK in poverty, exacerbated by years of Conservative austerity, £200 million of tax payer money should not be used for a new yacht which would be used by an unelected head of state.
attributes.background: Do not commission a new Royal yacht and use the £200 million to instead help those who have been most affected by the pandemic and years of austerity.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/584822
